main event: An unidentified object was observed in Atlanta, Georgia, on September 29, 1952.
interesting points: The object was yellowish and round, observed for 7-8 seconds, The object displayed normal maneuvers, The sighting was recorded in the Project Blue Book documents, Multiple witnesses, including an Air Force pilot, reported similar sightings in the area.
witness description: An Air Force pilot and his wife, both confirmed the sighting.
